about.title: About Us
about.mission: Making public transport accessible through technology.
about.heroDesc: We are dedicated to revolutionizing public transportation in Bengaluru by making it accessible, predictable, and stress-free for everyone.
about.visionText: Public transport is the lifeline of any major city. However, uncertainty and lack of information can make it a daunting experience. Our goal is to bridge the gap between commuters and transit systems using advanced technology like AI and real-time GPS tracking. We believe in an inclusive future where technology serves everyone.

chatbotResponses.greeting: Hello! I help you track buses. Ask me 'Where is bus 189?'
chatbotResponses.greetingHelper: Hello! I can help you track buses. Try asking 'Where is bus 189?' or 'When will bus 335E arrive?'.
chatbotResponses.eta: Bus {busNo} will arrive in approximately {eta} minutes.
chatbotResponses.fullStatus: Bus {busNo} is at {area} and arriving in {eta} mins.
chatbotResponses.unknownBus: I'm not sure which bus you mean. I have information for: {available}.
chatbotResponses.fallback: I didn't understand that. You can ask me about bus locations, for example: 'Where is bus 189?'
